text: Nina Agdal wrote a message on her social media account today detailing her body - shaming experiences after a magazine allegedly refused to run a cover photo of her because she couldn ’ t fit into the sample size clothing. The Danish model, 25, who has appeared in countless magazine campaigns such as Maxim and Sports Illustrated Swimsuit, made her comments today on Instagram.
